trans-unit.source: Provides event data that is used as a parameter object in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging"></xref> events of the root <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg a paraméter objektumként használt esemény adatait a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged"> </xref> és <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging"> </xref> események a legfelső szintű <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: This class is exposed as the `e` parameter in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events.
trans-unit.target: Ez az osztály van közzétéve, mint a `e` paramétere a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>és <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>események.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event is raised just before a new view is displayed, as a result of the end-user clicking and dragging in a chart area.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>esemény jelenik meg, mielőtt új nézet jelenik meg, a végfelhasználó kattintással és húzással a diagramterület eredményeképpen.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event is raised just after the new view is created.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>esemény jelenik meg, csak az új nézet létrehozása után.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: It is important to note that the position and size of a view cannot be set in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: Fontos megjegyezni, hogy a pozíció és nézet mérete nem állítható be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>esemény mivel ebben az esetben a nézet már létrehozott.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The ViewEventArgs class contains the following properties: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> object in which the view is being displayed.
trans-unit.target: A ViewEventArgs osztály tartalmazza a következő tulajdonságokkal: - a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>tulajdonságot, amelynek segítségével kéri le a a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea>objektum, amelyhez a nézet jelenik meg, a.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A> property gets the name of the chart area.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A>tulajdonság lekérdezi a diagramterületnek a nevét.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other chart area properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: Más diagram terület tulajdonságok is megadható.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A> property, which is used to get the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> object with which the view is associated.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A>tulajdonságot, amelynek segítségével kéri le a a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis>objektum, amelyhez a nézet társítva.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.Axis%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine the type of axis, which can be X, Y, X2 or Y2, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A állapítható meg a tengely, amely X, Y, X2 vagy Y2, használja a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Other axis properties can also be set.
trans-unit.target: Más axis attribútum tulajdonságai is megadható.

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A> property, which represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>tulajdonság, amely egy nézet új helyzete.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewPosition%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property, which represents the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>tulajdonság, amely annak nézet új méretét.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A> property, which represents the unit of measurement for the size of a view.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A>tulajdonságot, amelynek a mértékegységet méretéhez nézet jelöli.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSizeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified axis and newPosition parameters.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a és a megadott osztály axis és newPosition paraméterek.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: A skála nézet a tengelyt.

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: A kezdő pozíciója a méretezés új nézet.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified axis, newPosition, newSize and newSizeType parameters.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a és a megadott osztály axis , newPosition , newSize és newSizeType paraméterek.

trans-unit.source: The axis of the scale view.
trans-unit.target: A skála nézet a tengelyt.

trans-unit.source: The start position of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: A kezdő pozíciója a méretezés új nézet.

trans-unit.source: The new scale view size.
trans-unit.target: Az új méretezési nézet méretét.

trans-unit.source: The unit of measurement for the size of the new scale view.
trans-unit.target: A mértékegységet méretéhez új megtekintése.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> objektum, amely egy nézet tartozik.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság a tesz elérhetővé a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>és <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>események a legfelső szintű <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objektum.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to: - Determine the type of axis—X, X2, Y or Y2—that the event is being raised for, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság a következőkre használható:-tengely típusának meghatározása – X, Y vagy Y2 X2 –, amelyek az esemény alatt jelenik meg, használja a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.AxisName%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Get and set axis properties, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.
trans-unit.target: -A get és set axis attribútum tulajdonságai, például a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis.LineColor%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"></xref> object that represents the axis that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Axis"> </xref> a tengely, amely egy nézet tartozik képviselő objektum.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> objektum, amely egy nézet tartozik.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság a tesz elérhetővé a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>és <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>események a legfelső szintű <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objektum.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A> property can be used to determine the chart area that the view belongs to, by accessing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> property.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>tulajdonság segítségével határozza meg a diagramterület, amelyhez a nézet tartozik, elérésével a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea.Name> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ScrollBarEventArgs.ChartArea%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can also be used to get and set chart area properties.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság is használható, és a diagram terület tulajdonságainak beállítása.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"></xref> object that represents the chart area a view belongs to.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ChartArea"> </xref> tartozik egy nézetet a diagramterület képviselő objektum.

trans-unit.source: Gets the new position of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a tengely mentén nézet új pozícióját.

trans-unit.source: This property is exposed in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> events of the root <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> object, and represents the new position of a view.
trans-unit.target: Ez a tulajdonság a tesz elérhetővé a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>és <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>események a legfelső szintű <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>objektumot, és egy nézet új helyzete.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because in this case the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: A NewPosition tulajdonság egy új értékre állítható be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>esemény, de nem állítható be új értéket a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>esemény mivel ebben az esetben a nézet már létrehozott.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>

trans-unit.source: The NewPosition is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: A NewPosition mindig mérni, mint egy Tengelyérték.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the position of a view along an axis, which is either the bottom of a vertical view or the left position of a horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> érték, amely egy tengely, amely a nézet alsó részén található egy függőleges vagy vízszintes nézet bal oldali pozíciója nézet pozícióját jelöli.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a tengely mentén nézet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""></xref> value that represents the size of a view along an axis.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_double" name="double" href=""> </xref> érték, amely egy nézet egy tengely mentén méretét adja meg.

trans-unit.source: The size is either the height of the vertical view or the width of the horizontal view.
trans-unit.target: A függőleges nézet magasságát vagy a vízszintes nézet szélességének mérete.

trans-unit.source: Gets the unit of measurement for the new size of a view.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a mértékegységet az új méretéhez nézet.

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is automatically determined by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> control, and will be either a number or a day.
trans-unit.target: Ha ez a tulajdonság értéke <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>, a mértékegységét a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>tulajdonság automatikusan meghatározza a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart>szabályozza, és egy szám vagy egy napon.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Recall that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property is always measured as an axis value.
trans-unit.target: Visszahívása, amely a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>tulajdonság egy Tengelyérték, mindig mérik.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Make sure that if you explicitly set the size type, the type matches the axis that the scrollbar belongs to.
trans-unit.target: Győződjön meg arról, hogy ha a típust, a megegyezik a tengely, amely szabályozza a görgetősáv tartozik.

trans-unit.source: In other words, do not specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType> if the axis does not use <xref:System.DateTime> values.
trans-unit.target: Más szóval nem ad meg <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>Ha nem használja a tengely <xref:System.DateTime>értékek.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType>

trans-unit.source: Note that the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A> property can be set to a new value in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> event, but cannot be set to a new value for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> event because the view is already created.
trans-unit.target: Vegye figyelembe, hogy a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>tulajdonság egy új értékre állítható be a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging>esemény, de nem állítható be új értéket a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged>esemény, mert a nézet létrehozása már be van állítva.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.Chart.AxisViewChanging> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref> enumeration value that represents the unit of measurement for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*> property, which represents the width or height of a data view.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref> számbavételi érték, amely jelöli az mértékegységét a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*>tulajdonságot, amelynek a szélességének vagy magasságának adatnézet jelöli.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.ViewEventArgs.NewSize*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Az alapértelmezett érték <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataVisualization.Charting.DateTimeIntervalType"> </xref>.
